mapper.select: SELECT f.franchisee_no, f.franchisee_name, f.franchisee_phone, f.owner_no, a.address_no, a.road_address, a.jibun_address, a.detail_address FROM franchisee f INNER JOIN p_address a ON f.address_no = a.address_no

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_type, a.address_no, road_address, jibun_address, detail_address FROM p_customer c INNER JOIN p_address a ON c.address_no = a.address_no WHERE c.customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, seat_no as seatNo, seat_row as seatRow, seat_cols as seatCols, seat_use as seatUse FROM seat WHERE franchisee_no = #{String}
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, franchisee_name as franchiseeName FROM franchisee
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, franchisee_name as franchiseeName FROM franchisee WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seat_reservation ( franchisee_no, seat_no, customer_name, customer_no, reservation_date ) VALUES ( #{franchiseeNo}, #{seatNo}, #{customerName}, #{customerNo}, #{reservationDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, seat_no as seatNo, customer_no as customerNo, customer_name as customerName, reservation_date as reservationDate FROM seat_reservation WHERE reservation_date <= date_add(NOW(),INTERVAL 10 minute) AND franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cancel_seat_reservation ( franchisee_no, seat_no, customer_name, customer_no, reservation_date ) VALUES ( #{franchiseeNo}, #{seatNo}, #{customerName}, #{customerNo}, #{reservationDate} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM seat_reservation WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo} AND seat_no = #{seatNo}
mapper.select: SELECT MIN(pic_no) as picNo, franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, file_name as fileName, extension as extension, content_type as contentType, size as size, origin_name as originName FROM franchisee_pic GROUP BY franchisee_no

SELECT pic_no as picNo, franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, file_name as fileName, extension as extension, content_type as contentType, size as size, origin_name as originName FROM franchisee_pic WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}

SELECT f.food_no as foodNo, f.franchisee_no as fanchiseeNo, f.food_name as foodName, f.food_category as foodCategory, f.food_price as foodPrice, fp.file_name as fileName, fp.extension as extension, fp.content_type as contentType, fp.size as size, fp.origin_name as originName FROM food as f LEFT JOIN food_pic as fp ON fp.food_no = f.food_no WHERE f.franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, cpu as cpu, vga as vga, ram as ram FROM franchisee_spec
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food_reservation ( food_no, reservation_count, reservation_date, customer_no, customer_name ) VALUES ( #{foodNo}, #{reservationCount}, #{reservationDate}, #{customerNo}, #{customerName} )
mapper.select: SELECT fr.food_reservation_no as reservationNo, fr.food_no as foodNo, fr.reservation_count as reservationCount, fr.reservation_date as reservationDate, fr.customer_no as customerNo, fr.customer_name as customerName FROM food_reservation as fr INNER JOIN food as f ON fr.food_no = f.food_no WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo} AND fr.reservation_date <= date_add(NOW(),INTERVAL 10 minute)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cancel_food_reservation ( food_reservation_no, food_no, reservation_count, reservation_date, customer_no, customer_name ) VALUES ( #{reservationNo}, #{foodNo}, #{reservationCount}, #{reservationDate}, #{customerNo}, #{customerName} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, f.franchisee_name as franchiseeName, count(*) as count FROM ( SELECT franchisee_no, customer_no FROM seat_reservation UNION ALL SELECT franchisee_no, customer_no FROM cancel_seat_reservation ) as a LEFT JOIN franchisee as f ON a.franchisee_no = f.franchisee_no WHERE a.customer_no = #{customerNo} GROUP BY a.franchisee_no

SELECT a.food_no as foodNo, f.food_name as foodName, sum(a.reservation_count) as sum FROM ( SELECT food_no, customer_no, reservation_count FROM food_reservation UNION ALL SELECT food_no, customer_no, reservation_count FROM cancel_food_reservation ) as a left join food as f ON a.food_no = f.food_no WHERE a.customer_no = #{ownerNo} AND f.franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo} GROUP BY a.food_no

SELECT a.food_no as foodNo, sum(a.reservation_count) as sum, a.customer_no as customerNo, a.customer_name as customerName, f.food_price as foodPrice, (sum(a.reservation_count)*f.food_price) as totalPrice FROM ( SELECT food_no, reservation_count, customer_no, customer_name FROM food_reservation UNION ALL SELECT food_no, reservation_count, customer_no, customer_name FROM cancel_food_reservation ) as a INNER JOIN food as f ON a.food_no = f.food_no WHERE a.customer_no = #{customerNo} GROUP BY a.food_no
SELECT qna_no as qnaNo, qna_type as qnaType, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_answer as qnaAnswer, DATE_FORMAT(qna_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as qnaDate FROM customer_qna WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_qna( customer_no, qna_type, qna_title, qna_question, qna_answer, qna_date, customer_mail ) VALUES ( #{customerNo}, #{qnaType}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaQuestion}, #{qnaAnswer}, NOW(), #{customerMail} )
mapper.select: SELECT qna_type as qnaType, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_question as qnaQuestion, qna_answer as qnaAnswer, DATE_FORMAT(qna_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as qnaDate FROM customer_qna WHERE qna_no = #{qnaNo}
